references.reason: This paper is foundational to diffusion models, a topic highly relevant to the advancements in deep learning mentioned in the introduction.
This work significantly advanced the field of large language models and few-shot learning, which is directly relevant to the context of ANNs and their limitations.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This study highlights the potential of using natural language supervision for visual model training, which offers a new perspective on the development of ANNs and SNNs.

references.paper_title: Networks of spiking neurons: The third generation of neural network models
references.reason: This paper introduced the concept of spiking neural networks and laid the groundwork for much of the subsequent research in this area.

references.paper_title: Neuronal dynamics: From single neurons to networks and models of cognition
references.reason: This book comprehensively covers the field of neuronal dynamics, providing a crucial theoretical framework for understanding the behavior of SNNs.
